item.title: Use Azure Blob storage Container Storage Interface (CSI) driver on an ARO cluster
item.description: The Azure Blob Storage Container Storage Interface (CSI) is a CSI compliant driver that can be installed to an Azure Red Hat OpenShift (ARO) cluster to manage the lifecycle of Azure Blob storage. When you use this CSI driver to mount an Azure Blob storage into a pod, it allows you to use blob storage to work with massive amounts of data. You can refer also to the driver’s documentation here .
